about_the_game:
Get ready for Halloween with special costume-like gear: Pumpkin helmet! Hurry while the celebration lasts!

Their characteristics will definitely make your enemies tremble. Show'em hell!

Protection parameters: 400 protection from most types of damage, including mutants, anomalies, bullets, fire, poison and electricity.

Complete with air filter.

Non-transferrable. Can't be restored, but cheap to repair.

All the premium items (from DLC) will be placed in "Rewards" tab in your game account (on website). From there you can send them to any of your characters in the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Anomaly Zone - Pumpkin Helmet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6800 / ATI X1800 (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet speed 512 Kbps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX660 / Radeon HD 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet speed 1024 Kbps (for voice chat)

short_description: Get ready for Halloween with special Pumpkin helmet. Their characteristics will definitely make your enemies tremble. Show'em hell! Hurry while the celebration lasts!
